data.text: @JakeRoberts99 @ancetarvida Labdien! Konkrētā ķiršu akcija attiecās uz tiešajiem lidojumiem, kas atzīmēti ar trijstūrīti - Jūsu ekrānšāviņā redzamie lidojumi ir ar savienojumiem! :) https://t.co/LuMDBymzNK
@ajakonis Not at the moment directly in app, however we are working on the app improvements and there should be news in regards to this in the future! :)

@ajakonis Hi! This won't be entirely correct, as we do have an app available (airBaltic Club) as well as boarding pass can be added to the Wallet app when flying from most of our destinations! :) https://t.co/CCdO5c4plN

What would life be without phones? 📱 During last year, a total of 320 000 flights have been booked via mobile devices, increasing mobile bookings to 28%! More information here: https://t.co/LGTYpFwgLM https://t.co/LhjL6od82T
@skruzkalne Labrīt! Esam saņēmuši Jūsu DM ziņu. Turpināsim problēmas risinājumu tur.

@Arn_Bush @Talis_L ...nelieto, vai lieto to nepareizi. Arī e-pastos un medijos esam vairākkārt informējuši un atgādinājuši mūsu pasažieriem par pareizu maskas lietošanas etiķeti. Taču, paldies par atsauksmi, nodosim to kolēģiem. (2/2)
https://t.co/2GhhyXqRkh

@Arn_Bush @Talis_L Labdien! Apstiprinām, ka visos mūsu lidojumos pasažieri vairākas reizes tiek informēti par obligātas maskas lietošanu reisa laikā (gan ar video, gan paziņojumu starpniecību). Tāpat, arī mūsu gaisa kuģa apkalpe iespēju robežās tam seko līdzi, aizrādot pasažieriem, kas masku (1/2)

@tiferet333 Good morning!
Seems like a tehnical issue as we can confirm - passenger is only charged for the initial sum of the purchased booking (including additional services). Please DM us privately your booking reference as well as screenshots from your internet bank about transactions.

February issue of Baltic Outlook is out! 🗺️ Surrounded by the magnetic waters of the Mediterranean, medieval castles, and lush marvels of nature, #Cyprus is in the spotlight this month.
Read this and other stories on board & online 👉 https://t.co/l1lRhvVc8x https://t.co/GW84x2yl8Z

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text: Stress-free travel and protection for your trip does sound nice! That’s why we have partnered up with XCover to offer you travel insurance - simply add it while purchasing your ticket online via https://t.co/YZH2a4156m ✈️☂️ More information available here: https://t.co/ZNb5Ux47K4 https://t.co/71TBENxfm2
@kachha_ Labāk vēlāk, nekā nekad... 🙈😊 https://t.co/FBonP3nmez

@maira_slujeva @GalaxyJudge Labvakar, Maira! Aicinām iepazīties ar tiešsaistes reģistrācijas nosacījumiem mūsu mājas lapā: https://t.co/RzUY185Kid
Paldies! :)

@waerth Once more - our regrets for the inconveniences you have encountered. As mentioned - please submit us a claim via our web site. Our colleagues form Customer Relations department will investigate this matter further and will get back to you. Thank you.

urls.title: Submit a claim | Contact us | airBaltic
urls.description: Left your belongings on the plane? Was your baggage delayed? You can submit a claim about baggage, flight irregularities and more to airBaltic online.

data.text:
@waerth Hello! We are sorry to hear that you have had a negative experience whilst using our services. We kindly invite you to submit us a claim: https://t.co/hsp1wiTwY9
Our colleagues will investigate your particular situation and will provide an answer. Thank you.
@IvanRoAviador Good morning! May we ask for your case number as well as baggage irregularity reference in Direct Message? Thank you!

Pamosties ar tasi siltas kafijas. Tik pazīstamajām ērtībām, kur vienmēr ir blakus kāds, kurš runā tavā valodā. Tu zini, ka jutīsies brīvi ceļā uz visiem 70 galamērķiem lidmašīnā, kur par tevi parūpēsies. Lido ar savējiem. Jūties kā mājās! https://t.co/1UB2lT4Cy9

@Ozolinssh Labdien! Drošība ir airBaltic nozīmīgākā prioritāte. airBaltic stingri ievēro atbildīgo iestāžu rekomendācijas gaisa ceļu izmantošanā, kā arī regulāri veic neatkarīgus drošības izvērtējumus. Lidojuma maršrutus ikdienā ietekmē arī, piemēram, spēcīgs pretvējš vai negaiss.

We are proud to share that during the year 2021, airBaltic has maintained its status as the largest air mail carrier in the region! ✉️ ✈️ We have carried over 640 000 bags of airmail, totaling almost 9 000 tonnes of cargo and mail: https://t.co/dlygUugxR3 https://t.co/YYdOY1jwBr

To keep our customers and staff safe during the pandemic, only medical face masks or unvalved respirators will be accepted on board of airBaltic flights.
👉 Read more about the health and safety measures throughout your trip with us: https://t.co/2XRERWiQRA https://t.co/1QOu6ACE8E

@entinenhuippu Once we will start operating flights out of Tampere to multiple destinations (including Frankfurt), passengers will be able to enjoy our wide codeshare network! If the particular route will not available via webpage, our Call Center agents can look into manual booking options! 😊
@Sauljuksss Home is where the heart (pastéis de nata) is! 🇵🇹💚

data.text:
@entinenhuippu Good morning! You may find all airBaltic codeshare partners here: https://t.co/zilVmhaNCX
As for the availability, due to Covid-19 pandemic many airlines have cut their networks at the moment, however there are still great destinations available through our codeshare partners: https://t.co/eq9P6YwMW4

We are excited to announce a new codeshare agreement between @ITAAirways and airBaltic! Our customers will benefit from convenient access to various destinations in Italy, while ITA Airways passengers can now purchase tickets to Riga: https://t.co/pqxJrLXhEq https://t.co/IWuA0HzKNB

data.text: @peculiarplanets Hello! Thanks for your question. Unfortunately currently we won't be able to comment on such hypothetical statement here via social media. However, in a case of a flight cancelation from our side, all passengers with active reservations will be informed accordingly. Thank you.

data.text: @Madala3 Labdien! Paldies par jautājumu! Vēlamies informēt, ka ieceļošanas noteikumus nosaka konkrētā valsts, nevis aviokompānija. Tā kā informācija mēdz strauji mainīties, lūgums sazināties ar atbildīgās valsts iestādēm vai apmeklēt mūsu mājaslapu: https://t.co/qHFIBt3sEn

@SalvisLapins Šādu paziņojumu sistēma rādīs, ja airBaltic veikti lidojumi konkrētajos datumos nav pieejami. Iesakām izmantot mūsu sākumlapu, kur būs skaidri pārredzama informācija par tiešajiem reisiem, to datumiem mēneša skatos. Piemēram, Jūsu meklētajā maršrutā tiešie reisi atsāksies maijā. https://t.co/SMMH9JIYgd

@SalvisLapins Labdien! Informējam, ka balstoties uz straujajām izmaiņām pašreizējā situācijā, kas mēdz ietekmēt lidojuma grafiku, lidojumu saraksts pieejams tikai Baltic Outlook žurnālā mēneša ietvarā. Tāpat piedāvājam arī digitālu rīku lidojumu saraksta meklēšanai: https://t.co/3bpYlcj2u0

urls.title: airBaltic City Collection - Collection | OpenSea
urls.description: airBaltic – the flag carrier of Latvia, in honour of Latvia’s centenary, in 2018, invited everyone to vote on their favourite towns and cities in Latvia, after which the company’s Airbus A220-300 fleet was named. Starting with Kuldiga, these cities will now one by one be represented on the digital art pieces issued by airBaltic. airBaltic’s jet fleet is the youngest in the Europe, consisting solely of the brand new Airbus A220-300.

data.text: airBaltic's new #NFT collection is live! 🔔 Edition #8 is showcasing Ogre city #cryptoart. Available on @OpenSea for a fixed price of 0.01 Ether. airBaltic City Collection can be purchased now by the #NFTCommmunity: https://t.co/JWOKOTvEK2 https://t.co/8kC9b8o2Gw

@yanablumka Also please be reminded that regulations are changing rapidly and vary per country, therefore always make sure you have the latest information before the flight to have a smooth journey! Thank you!

urls.description: Your guide to getting the right information about travel documentation and up-to-date travel requirements.

data.text:

For more details we kindly invite you to contact the local authorities for the latest updates on the current situation.

data.text: @JorikHendrickx @LoenaHendrickx We found the baggage irregularity file and at the moment unfortunately there are no new details available. However - rest assured, our teams are doing everything in their power and you will be contacted once baggage can be delivered. Once again, apologies for the inconveniences.

urls.title: Delayed, lost or damaged baggage | Baggage Rules | airBaltic
urls.description: To ensure the soonest possible tracing and delivery, delayed baggage should be reported immediately after the flight.

data.text:
@JorikHendrickx @LoenaHendrickx Hello! Firstly please accept our sincere apologies for the inconveniences caused due to delayed baggage. We kindly invite you to visit our web page to learn about the further steps to be taken in this situation: https://t.co/pDmf3gcMZN
Thank you.

@IngaAmber Labdien! Atvainojamies par reisa atcelšanu. Visi pasažieri tiek informēti par izmaiņām šādās situācijās ar e-pasta un SMS starpniecību. Daļu pasažieru, diemžēl, nesasniedzam, jo iegādājoties rezervāciju norādīti neprecīzi kontakti, vai arī ceļoj. aģentūra tādus nav pievienojusi.

@SabineAstra Labvakar! Sākot ar 12.janvāri, pilnībā vakcinētiem (vai pārslimojušiem) pasažieriem ar derīgu sertifikātu, pirms lidojuma uz Latviju negatīvs Covid-19 testa rezultāts vairs nav nepieciešams.

https://t.co/1UiREyNnUt

@IvanRoAviador Please note that all submitted claims are reviewed in order they are received and usually answered within 10-15 working days (can be longer due to Holiday period). Thanks for your patience.

urls.title: Delayed, lost or damaged baggage | Baggage Rules | airBaltic
urls.description: To ensure the soonest possible tracing and delivery, delayed baggage should be reported immediately after the flight.

data.text:
@IvanRoAviador Good evening! Sorry to hear about such situation, our apologies for inconveniences caused. We kindly invite you to visit this link for all your next steps: https://t.co/pDmf3gcMZN
If the claim has been already submitted, it will be reviewed by our Customer Relations team.

In 2021 airBaltic has carried 1 628 000 passengers or 21% more than the year before. Last year we have performed 23 440 flights from all three Baltic states. Read more: https://t.co/JCUIWmTDgM https://t.co/9B1pgpWQTV

@olks_ts Good morning! We are saddened to hear about such unpleasant situation, our apologies. May we ask you to DM us privately more details about the situation as well as your baggage irregularity reference number which you got when declaring the loss?
@ArtursBridaks Fingers crossed! 🤞 Happy 2022 and see you on board!
@artauma Amazing! See you on board! 💚
@artauma Which countries would these be? 🤔
What are your travel goals for 2022? 🌍 https://t.co/fxJKeAAzsa

data.text:
The first Baltic Outlook issue of 2022 is here and filled with travel stories from around the world!🗺️ This month in the spotlight is Bergen - Norway's second largest city where mountains and national parks are utterly breathtaking.
Read on board & online: https://t.co/CndZ9SaUNU https://t.co/dqfv8bKwpL
@SandisFre Servisa klase (GREEN) Jūsu situācijā ir tāda pati abām rezervāciju klasēm, taču viena šajā situācijā ir lētākā cenu kategorijā, un otra - dārgākā cenu kategorijā.

@SandisFre GREEN ir servisa klase, kura sevī ietver dažādas rezervāciju klases (cenu kategorijas, jeb līmeņus). Tā ir ierasta prakse aviācijā. Konkrēto rezervācijas klasi iespējams redzēt arī mūsu mājaslapā, šeit piemērs ar Jūsu izvēlētajiem reisiem: https://t.co/VdCKCZmcOH

@SandisFre Labvakar! Kā jau minēts spēles noteikumos, atlaide nav spēkā zemākajās cenu klasēs. Jūsu ekrānšāviņā redzams, ka konkrētajam lidojumam joprojām ir pieejamas biļetes šajā cenu kategorijā (ķirsīšu biļetes), tāpēc sistēma atlaidi piemēro no nāk. klasēm, kam tā ir iespējama. https://t.co/TYRFiRYmcF
Our cabin crew is ready to welcome you onboard the beautiful #A220 in 2022! ✈️ https://t.co/URIDdRu0PT

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text: @soycig Thank you and apologies for the cancellation. If the reservation was purchased via https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg, please visit our webpage's section "My Booking" where you should be able to request the refund automatically.
@soycig Good evening! May we ask you for more details - what is the purpose of communication (to better understand which contacts provide to you)? Thanks.
@therigaspotter @Arlanda Have a nice flight! ✈️

data.text: Reply with the best city for New Year's celebration👇 https://t.co/f5h8DQ26Jl
@WhyCharlieBrown Please note that all incoming e-mails are reviewed in order they are received and may take up to 72 hours (in standard cases outside the Holiday season) for an answer.
